The claim states that FBI agents raided: Debbie Wasserman-Schultz's home and seized smashed computer hard drives.
The Daily Caller story cited by FreedomD: com contradicts the claim, stating that it was Imran Awan, not Wasserman-Schultz, who had lived in the premises where the equipment was seized.
